title: Delete Leaked from Training NCAAM/NCAAW - Stage1
description: Here is a function I made in order to delete leaked data from the training set. It removes all the matches from the training set that appear also in the test set. It inputs two DataFrame : df_train (input data set) and df_test (test data set).
description_lemmatized: function made order delete leaked data training set remove match training set appear also test set input two dataframe df_train input data set df_test test data set
